original_title: Kaotic Drumline: Drumming With a Difference
overview: On the South Side of Chicago, the Kaotic Drumline brings people together with creativity, energy and hope. [Documentary Short] . . . Conceived as a follow-up to the critically-acclaimed documentary "Tomorrow's Hope" (https://tomorrowshopefilm.com).
title: Kaotic Drumline: Drumming With a Difference
